DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study evaluate effect sodium bicarbonate administration cardiopulmonary resuscitation result outcomes cardiac arrest patient severe metabolic acidosis .
DOC.brief_title: Bicarbonate Patients With Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest
DOC.criteria: adult cardiac arrest patient arterial pH < 7.1 bicarbonate < 10mmEq/L check 10 minute cardiopulmonary resuscitation age < 18 trauma patient Do Not Resuscitate state
